snippet.title: E3 Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Exclusive E3 reveal trailer shown at the E3 Xbox 2017 Briefing!

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC is a first-person co-operative sci-fi shooter for up to 4 players, featuring fully procedural and destructible environments to explore, mine, and explode your way through to reach your objectives.

Coming to Steam Early Access and Game Preview on Xbox One & Windows 10 in early 2018.

--------------------
Sign up for Closed Alpha access to Deep Rock Galactic at our website: http://www.ghostship.dk
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ghostshipgames/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/GhostShip_Games
